name: Vertical Grid
tagline: A vertical grid css system designed to play nice with Bootstrap.
body:
A vertical grid css system designed to play nice with Bootstrap.

Take your grid from this:

![Default Bootstrap grid](https://raw.github.com/arkadyan/vertical_grid/master/example/images/Bootstrap.png)

to this:

![Vertical Grid grid](https://raw.github.com/arkadyan/vertical_grid/master/example/images/Vertical_Grid.png)

Look in the example directory for some sample html code.

Wrap all your elements in an element with `class="container-vertical"`.

Add one of `vertical-span1, vertical-span2, ... vertical-span12` to each of your rows.

Rows can be nested.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
